last_episode_to_air.name: Pim Finally Turns Green
last_episode_to_air.overview: After eating a mysterious artefact found at an ancient burial ground, Pim suddenly and mysteriously turns bright green to everyone's dismay.

name: Smiling Friends
overview: Smiling Friends Inc. is a small company whose main purpose is to bring happiness and make people smile. The series follows the day-to-day lives and misadventures of its representatives, the lazy, cynical Charlie, and the cheerful, optimistic Pim, as they try to cheer up and comfort the troubled people who call their company's hotline. They receive seemingly simple requests but the jobs turn out to be more complicated than they seem, making it difficult to bring happiness to the world.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Delve into the world of Smiling Friends, where Pim, Charlie, Zongo, Allan and Glep fight off evildoers and nasty baddies and maybe some characters smile on the way as well! After all, it IS their job!!! This SHALL be an epic season and you SHALL enjoy it!

episodes.name: Desmond's Big Day Out
episodes.overview: A small company dedicated to bringing happiness to the world receives a simple request to help a woman's unhappy son smile again, but the job turns out to be more complicated than it seems.

guest_stars.character: Pim's Sister / Pim's Mom / Pim's Dad / Bliblie (voice)
guest_stars.name: Michael Cusack

episodes.name: Mr. Frog
episodes.overview: After beloved frog celebrity Mr. Frog gets into hot frog water, Pim and Charlie are tasked with helping the frog get things back on frog track. Meanwhile, Glep has a crazy side adventure that has the critics going wild.

guest_stars.character: Rex / Mr. Frog / Jacob the Goblin / Meep Foundation Lady (voice)
guest_stars.name: Michael Cusack

episodes.name: Shrimp's Odyssey
episodes.overview: When a truly pathetic shrimp calls the Smiling Friends hotline after being dumped by his true love, Shrimpina, Pim and Charlie have very different ideas about how to handle the situation.

episodes.name: A Silly Halloween Special
episodes.overview: Pim ventures into the forest across the road to fetch firewood for the office Halloween party.

episodes.name: Who Violently Murdered Simon S. Salty?
episodes.overview: Who is famous food tycoon Simon S. Salty? Why was he brutally murdered in his own restaurant? Who done did do that there murder? Huh?

episodes.name: Enchanted Forest
episodes.overview: Pim and Charlie are beckoned into the mysterious Enchanted Forest by a princess and encounter all sorts of insane toon characters along their journey.

episodes.name: Frowning Friends
episodes.overview: A rival business moves across the street, much to the boss's dismay. Nuff said.

episodes.name: Charlie Dies and Doesn't Come Back
The Smiling Friends Go to Brazil!
episodes.overview: The Smiling Friends finally get to relax in a beautiful Brazilian beach town. Pim works on his novel, Charlie binges a load of torrent shows on his portable hard drive. Allan and Glep enjoy some long-awaited "chill out" time at the beach.

episodes.name: Gwimbly: Definitive Remastered Enhanced Extended Edition DX 4k (Anniversary Director's Cut)
episodes.overview: The classic gang help a disgusting, vile loser they found on the streets. However, Allan sprays him with the hose.

episodes.name: Mr. President
episodes.overview: Yes, You Do Need to Watch This Important Episode of Smiling Friends Where They Help the President Smile. Here's Why That's a Good Thing.

episodes.name: A Allan Adventure
episodes.overview: Allan is tasked with finding more paper clips for the office. *Spits on you*

episodes.name: Erm, the Boss Finds Love?
episodes.overview: DISCLAIMER: Just a heads up, this is the scariest episode of any cartoon that's ever been created.

episodes.name: Brother's Egg
episodes.overview: After some of the Boss's usual tomfoolery, Pim and Charlie are tasked with helping a mad scientist with an "egg dilemma".

episodes.name: Charlie, Pim, and Bill vs the Alien
episodes.overview: This episode tells the story of a thirty-four year-old boy named Pim who sets out to save his mother on Mars after she is abducted by Martians.

episodes.name: The Magical Red Jewel (aka Tyler Gets Fired)
episodes.overview: The Boss and Pim fight for their lives in a mysterious world called Spamtopia. Meanwhile, Charlie confronts Allan over something serious.

episodes.name: Pim Finally Turns Green
episodes.overview: After eating a mysterious artefact found at an ancient burial ground, Pim suddenly and mysteriously turns bright green to everyone's dismay.
